entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
